content: pumpkin hat by emily dormier gauge 1 inch = 4 stitches 6 row you will need 60 75 100 yards of orange worsted weight yarn 20 30 30 yards of green worsted weight yarn size us 8/5 0 mm 16 inch/40 cm circular needle size us 8/5 0 mm double pointed needles abbreviations k knit p purl ssk slip slip knit k2tog knit two together sizes 15 18 21 inches 38 45 5 53 centimeters cast on 60 72 84 stitches in orange onto circular needle and join in the round ribbing in orange *k2 p2* repeat until end of round for 4 6 8 rounds main section in orange *k10 p2* repeat until end of round for 14 16 24 rounds crown for smallest size only knit rounds 1 3 5 7 9 for medium and large knit all rounds the parts that are knit in green are bold underlined and written in green the parts that are knit in orange are written in orange round 1 *ssk k6 k2tog p2* repeat until stitch marker round 2 *k1 k6 k1 p2* repeat until stitch marker round 3 *ssk k4 k2tog p2* repeat until stitch marker round 4 *k1 k4 k1 p2* repeat until stitch marker round 5 *ssk k2 k2tog p2* repeat until stitch marker round 6 *k1 k2 k1 p2* repeat until stitch marker the remainder of the hat is worked in green round 7 *ssk k2tog p2* repeat until stitch marker round 8 *k2 p2* repeat until stitch marker round 9 *k2tog p2* repeat until stitch marker you should be left with 15 18 21 stitches round 10 *k2tog k1* repeat until stitch marker round 11 *k2tog* repeat until stitch marker round 12 small k2tog k1 k2tog medium k2tog three times large k1 k2tog k1 k2tog k1 knit 6 rounds cut the yarn pull through remaining loops weave in ends
